user_instruction: 'Send an email to Alex (alex@globaltech.com) to follow up on our conversation about tech trends. You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["alex@globaltech.com"],"subject":"Continuing our tech trends conversation","body":"Hi Alex,

I really enjoyed our recent discussion at the Global Tech Innovators Conference and wanted to keep the momentum going. I’d love to dive a bit deeper into the areas we touched on—particularly:

• Generative AI’s shift from experimentation to real-world production
• The move toward fault-tolerant quantum computing
• Practical blockchain applications for supply-chain transparency

If you’re free sometime next week, let me know a window that works for you and we can schedule a brief call. I’m looking forward to brainstorming ways we might collaborate around these themes.

Best regards,
Jane"}

formatted_items.content: Your follow-up email to Alex has been sent!

final_output: Your follow-up email to Alex has been sent!
